name: amalthea
author: Apollo <zhaoyang@jizhi.im>
description: the hyper front-end engine of data science

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && coffee -cb src/main.coffee && r.js -o src/build.js baseUrl=./src name=almond include=main out=dist/amalthea.js && hashmark dist/*.js -sl 7 'dist/{name}.{hash}.bundle.js' && gzip -r -f -k dist/*.js
